alert.note: Alert for Des Moines; Lee (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 5:31AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Hancock, southern Henderson, southwestern Warren, northwestern McDonough, southwestern Des Moines and northeastern Lee Counties through 615 AM CDT... At 531 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Denmark, or near Fort Madison, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Burlington, Macomb, Fort Madison, West Burlington, Colchester, La Harpe, Dallas City, Stronghurst, Blandinsville, Middletown, Carman, Terre Haute, Raritan, Sciota, Gulf Port, Colusa, Niota, Iowa Army Ammunition Plant, Disco and Denmark. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
